item.title: By: saxmaam

item.content:encoded:
Hey Ben,

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Yeah the old link seems to be broken. I have them saved locally however, so just send me an email and I'll email them to you!
item.content:encoded: Yeah the old link seems to be broken. I have them saved locally however, so just send me an email and I’ll email them to you!

item.title: By: saxmaam
item.dc:creator: saxmaam
item.description: Hey Ben, do you have a link for the answer books to Essential Life and Death. I tried to follow link on sensei's library, but it didn't work.
item.content:encoded: Hey Ben, do you have a link for the answer books to Essential Life and Death. I tried to follow link on sensei’s library, but it didn’t work.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Gotcha. Well, you're actually in luck, I ordered the whole series last night and plan on getting started on them & reviewing them as I go once they come in. =D
item.content:encoded: Gotcha. Well, you’re actually in luck, I ordered the whole series last night and plan on getting started on them & reviewing them as I go once they come in. =D

item.title: By: jcdyer3
item.dc:creator: jcdyer3
item.description: Nope. just curious. I'm hoping to get more serious about my go. I'm still ddk (about 12k on Dragon go Server, but wallowing in the 20s on ogs.) and thinking this kind of coursework might be helpful for me.
item.content:encoded: Nope. just curious. I’m hoping to get more serious about my go. I’m still ddk (about 12k on Dragon go Server, but wallowing in the 20s on ogs.) and thinking this kind of coursework might be helpful for me.
